FuncDef: The clear lldp neighbor command clears Link Layer Discovery Protocol (LLDP) neighbor information about a specific or all interfaces. The clear lldp neighbor command clears Link Layer Discovery Protocol (LLDP) neighbor information about a specific or all interfaces.

ParaDef.Info:
Clears neighbor information about a specified interface.
-

Examples: Warning: This Command will clear the neighbor information of all the ports. Continue? [Y/N]:y
ExtraInfo: Before you view LLDP neighbor information learned for a specified period of time or by a specified interface, run the clear lldp neighbor command to clear existing LLDP neighbor information about the interface. If no interface is specified, this command clears neighbor information about all interfaces on the device.
